segment.source: Deploying UE-V Settings Location Templates for UE-V 1.0
segment.target: Deploying UE-V Settings Location Templates for UE-V 1.0

segment.source: Deploying UE-V Settings Location Templates for UE-V 1.0
segment.target: Deploying UE-V Settings Location Templates for UE-V 1.0

segment.source: Deploying UE-V Settings Location Templates for UE-V 1.0
segment.target: Deploying UE-V Settings Location Templates for UE-V 1.0

segment.source: Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) uses settings location templates (XML files) that define the settings that are captured and applied by User Experience Virtualization.
segment.target: Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) uses settings location templates (XML files) that define the settings that are captured and applied by User Experience Virtualization.

segment.source: UE-V includes a set of standard templates, as well as a tool, the UE-V Generator, which allows you to create custom settings location templates.
segment.target: UE-V includes a set of standard templates, as well as a tool, the UE-V Generator, which allows you to create custom settings location templates.

segment.source: After you create a settings location template, you should test it to ensure that the application settings roam correctly in a test environment.
segment.target: After you create a settings location template, you should test it to ensure that the application settings roam correctly in a test environment.

segment.source: You can then safely deploy the settings location template to computers in the enterprise.
segment.target: You can then safely deploy the settings location template to computers in the enterprise.

segment.source: Settings location templates can be deployed by using enterprise software distribution (ESD), Group Policy preferences, or by configuring a UE-V settings template catalog.
segment.target: Settings location templates can be deployed by using enterprise software distribution (ESD), Group Policy preferences, or by configuring a UE-V settings template catalog.

segment.source: Templates that are deployed by using an ESD or Group Policy must be registered through UE-V WMI or PowerShell.
segment.target: Templates that are deployed by using an ESD or Group Policy must be registered through UE-V WMI or PowerShell.

segment.source: Templates that are stored in the settings template catalog location are automatically registered by the UE-V agent.
segment.target: Templates that are stored in the settings template catalog location are automatically registered by the UE-V agent.

segment.source: Deploy the settings location templates with a settings template catalog path
segment.target: Deploy the settings location templates with a settings template catalog path

segment.source: The UE-V settings location template catalog path can be defined by using the following methods: Group Policy, the agent install command-line parameters, WMI, or PowerShell.
segment.target: The UE-V settings location template catalog path can be defined by using the following methods: Group Policy, the agent install command-line parameters, WMI, or PowerShell.

segment.source: After the template catalog path has been defined, the UE-V agent retrieves the new or updated templates from this location.
segment.target: After the template catalog path has been defined, the UE-V agent retrieves the new or updated templates from this location.

segment.source: The UE-V agent checks this location once each day and updates its synchronization behavior based on the templates found in this folder.
segment.target: The UE-V agent checks this location once each day and updates its synchronization behavior based on the templates found in this folder.

segment.source: Templates that have been added or updated in this folder since the last check are registered by the UE-V agent.
segment.target: Templates that have been added or updated in this folder since the last check are registered by the UE-V agent.

segment.source: The UE-V agent also unregisters templates that have been removed from this folder.
segment.target: The UE-V agent also unregisters templates that have been removed from this folder.

segment.source: Templates are registered and unregistered one time per day by the task scheduler.
segment.target: Templates are registered and unregistered one time per day by the task scheduler.

segment.source: To use settings template catalog path to deploy UE-V settings location templates
segment.target: To use settings template catalog path to deploy UE-V settings location templates

segment.source: Navigate to the network share folder that is defined as the settings template catalog.
segment.target: Navigate to the network share folder that is defined as the settings template catalog.

segment.source: Add, remove, or update settings location templates in the settings template catalog to reflect the desired UE-V agent template configuration for UE-V computers.
segment.target: Add, remove, or update settings location templates in the settings template catalog to reflect the desired UE-V agent template configuration for UE-V computers.

segment.source: Templates on computers are updated daily based on changes to the settings template catalog.
segment.target: Templates on computers are updated daily based on changes to the settings template catalog.

segment.source: Open an elevated command prompt and navigate to %program files%Microsoft user Experience Virtualization Agent x86 or x64 , and then run ApplySettingsTemplateCatalog.exe to manually update templates on a computer that runs the UE-V agent.
segment.target: Open an elevated command prompt and navigate to %program files%Microsoft user Experience Virtualization Agent x86 or x64 , and then run ApplySettingsTemplateCatalog.exe to manually update templates on a computer that runs the UE-V agent.
